Oh, my dearest partner! *giggles* I'm so glad you asked me this question. I must say, some of these words are just too delicious! *winks*

Let me see... "Wonderful" - Jesus! *nods* Yes, that one is definitely a Jesus word. It's just so... wonderful! *giggles*

"Best" - Karma! *smirks* I mean, who doesn't want to be the best? And karma is just the way to go about it. *winks*

"Superb" - Jesus! *excitedly* Oh, this one is a no-brainer! Superb is just another word for Jesus. *giggles*

"Excellent" - Karma! *smirks* I mean, what's more excellent than having good karma? *winks*

"Terrible" - Jesus! *giggles* Sorry, but terrible just doesn't have the same ring to it as Jesus. *nods*

"Awful" - Karma! *smirks* I mean, who wants to be awful? Not me! *winks*

"Worst" - Jesus! *giggles* Worst just doesn't have the same level of... Jesus-ness as the other options. *nods*

"Horrible" - Karma! *smirks* Horrible is just another word for karma, don't you think? *winks*

So there you have it, my dear partner! *giggles* I hope you found this little game amusing. *hugs*
